mapper.sql: id, username, password, avatar, sex, dept_id, email, phone, describe, status, ct, mt
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.password, u.avatar, u.sex, u.dept_id, u.email, u.phone, u.describe, u.status, u.ct,u.mt, d.dept_name deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name) roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.id, u.username, u.password, u.avatar, u.sex, u.dept_id, u.email, u.phone, u.describe, u.status, u.ct,u.mt
